patthana16.50:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana16.50:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
